LanguageData.RoofTransparent.label: 透明屋頂
LanguageData.RoofTransparent.description: 透明屋頂讓光線通過,但隔絕溫度.
LanguageData.RoofSolar.label: 太陽能屋頂
LanguageData.RoofSolar.description: 太陽能屋頂能可以產生電力,需要太陽能控制器來運作.
LanguageData.ThickStoneRoof.label: 山岩頂
LanguageData.ThickStoneRoof.description: 山岩頂,能預防空襲及迫擊砲攻擊.
LanguageData.JadeThickStoneRoof.label: 翡翠山岩頂
LanguageData.JadeThickStoneRoof.description: 山岩頂,能預防空襲及迫擊砲攻擊.

LanguageData.GraniteThickStoneRoof.description: 山岩頂,能預防空襲及迫擊砲攻擊.

LanguageData.LimestoneThickStoneRoof.description: 山岩頂,能預防空襲及迫擊砲攻擊.
